name: Dr. Aminu Bello
description: Dr. Bello is a compassionate general practitioner with over 15 years of experience, dedicated to providing comprehensive family healthcare.

name: Dr. Ngozi Okoro
description: Dr. Okoro specializes in pediatric care, focusing on child development, vaccinations, and common childhood illnesses.

name: Prof. Emeka Eze
description: Prof. Eze is a leading cardiologist renowned for his expertise in heart disease diagnosis and treatment, with a focus on preventive care.

name: Dr. Fatima Aliyu
description: Dr. Aliyu provides expert dermatological services, addressing skin conditions, cosmetic concerns, and skin cancer screenings.

name: Dr. Chinedu Okafor
description: Dr. Okafor offers comprehensive women's health services, including prenatal care, reproductive health, and gynecological surgery.

name: Dr. Ifeoma Nwachukwu
description: A dedicated GP known for her patient-centered approach and commitment to holistic health.

name: Dr. Tunde Adebayo
description: Dr. Adebayo is a highly skilled surgeon with expertise in general and laparoscopic procedures.

name: Dr. Aisha Suleiman
description: Dr. Suleiman provides comprehensive dental care, from routine check-ups to advanced restorative procedures, ensuring healthy smiles.

name: Dr. Joseph Idowu
description: Dr. Idowu is an ophthalmologist specializing in eye health, vision correction, and treatment of eye diseases.

name: Dr. Chioma Eke
description: A warm and friendly pediatrician, Dr. Eke is committed to the health and well-being of her young patients.

name: Dr. David Obi
description: Experienced GP offering primary care services with a focus on patient education and preventive medicine.

name: Dr. Grace Ojo
description: Cardiologist providing expert diagnosis and management for a wide range of cardiovascular conditions.

name: Dr. Kelechi Kalu
description: Specializing in skin health, Dr. Kalu offers modern treatments for acne, eczema, and other dermatological issues.

name: Dr. Samuel Effiong
description: Dr. Effiong is a meticulous surgeon known for successful outcomes in various surgical procedures.

name: Dr. Brenda Uche
description: Compassionate OB/GYN providing comprehensive care for women through all stages of life, from adolescence to menopause.
